The staff was friendly and helpful.  It was here that I realized how much I like a cold beer with pintxos.  Don't be shy.  Step up to the bar and ask someone in a green shirt for however many plates you need.  Be ready to tell them what you want to drink as well (Have I mentioned the beer?).Then wander about to your hearts content.  We opted to stand up.  What I liked is that they carried hot pintxos (the little tapas bites) around on platters constantly.  Yes, this location was along one of our tour routes.  It wasn't too crowded.  Moreover, the food, atmosphere, beautiful weather, and camaraderie all made for a wonderful experience.
Diagonal Mar i Forum, Barcelona, Spain
